title: Western Union and MoneyGram
extract: MoneyGram is Western Union's biggest rival, and its fees are often cheaper. It recently changed its fees to a flat rate of $11.50 for transferring $50 to $900 within the United States, and 2% for amounts over $900. But MoneyGram built its reputation on international money transfers.Aug 26, 2015
